scripts.build: gulp build && mkdir -p dist && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify link/*.js --outfile dist/fxos-p2p-eng.js --standalone HTTPServer && mkdir -p example/simple/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-p2p-eng.js example/simple/lib/fxos-p2p-eng.js && mkdir -p example/p2p/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-p2p-eng.js example/p2p/lib/fxos-p2p-eng.js && mkdir -p example/directory/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-p2p-eng.js example/directory/lib/fxos-p2p-eng.js && mkdir -p example/upload/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-p2p-eng.js example/upload/lib/fxos-p2p-eng.js
